bibl.title: A Demotic Version of Nectanebos' Dream (P. Carlsberg 562).
bibl.note: P. Carlsberg 562, a Demotic manuscript from the Tebtunis Temple Library (late 1. / early 2. century AD), contains a parallel to the beginning of P. Leid. I, pap. U = U.P.Z. I, 81 (= Pack2 2476). - Transliteration. - Translation. - Textual Notes. - General Commentary.
RYHOLT Kim, A Demotic Version of Nectanebos' Dream (P. Carlsberg 562).
